nodes.text: The Spar subsector was a subsector in the Outer Rim Territories that neighboured the Moddell sector.

The Spar subsector was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 18. It originated as a sector in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in "Endor and the Moddell Sector" and article in Star Wars Gamer 9, which was written by Craig Robert Carey, Jason Fry, and Daniel Wallace and published in February, 2002.
